channel.title: Help to compile
channel.description:
hi iv got an problem with my compiler iv had this problem before but i forgot how to fix it. when i compile it it says i dont have JDK when i do. Then someone told me to edit it and type @echo off title Server Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
it said the system could not find the path specified.
WHAT DO I DO!!!!! plz tell me

item.title: Help to compile
item.dc:creator: @pure20gtbaw pure20gtbaw
item.description:
@pure20gtbaw wrote:

ok ty ill try that[br][size=1]Posted on: November 17, 2007, 03:28:01 AM[/size][hr]ITS STILL SAYS THE SAME THING

Read full topic

item.title: Help to compile
item.dc:creator: @God_Tricky God Tricky
item.description:
@God_Tricky wrote:

Find the path to JavaC.exe

To do this, go Mycomputer, C drive, Program files, Java…Find the Jdk folder, then go in to bin and copy and paste the location.

@echo off
title Server Compiler
“Your Path\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

Read full topic
